Text:
How is it if this is episode 11 it is labelled E12?

while each episode guide out there seems to have its own numbering sequence the official one at BBC.uk has this one as episode 11 and oddly the one named "A Heroes Welcome" doesn't even appear on their list.

http://www.bbc.co.uk/drama/heroes/unmasked/

Can anyone shed some light on the apparent inconsistency?

BiA messed up and labeled a special as a normal episode. so that threw the others up 1 number

who keeps giving these torrents bad ratings?
